fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Course Performance with Enrollment Cohorts
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to rank courses and break down completion rates by enrollment period (quarter-based cohorts).

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me the top 10 courses by enrollment in a chart. When I click on a course, show me a line chart of completion rates by enrollment quarter. Then let me click on any quarter to see the actual students who enrolled then and whether they completed.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes chart showing top 10 courses by enrollment
Clicking course shows completion rate trend chart by quarter
Clicking quarter data point shows student enrollment table with completion status
Three levels of drill-down work smoothly
Student table allows opening individual member/enrollment records
